# Getting started

Install via node package manager:

npm install @therunninghub/vue-date-picker

Integrate into your application via standard Vue api for registering and using components. Vue date pick is designed for usage with v-model directive.

<template>
    <vue-date-picker v-model="date" />
</template>

<script>
import VueDatePicker from '@therunninghub/vue-date-picker';
import '@therunninghub/vue-date-picker/dist/VueDatePicker.css';

export default {
    components: { VueDatePicker },
    data: () => ({
        date: '2019-01-01'
    })
};
</script>
